wikipedia_page.main: Norman Mason (born 23 July 1952) is a maths teacher in Leicester at Wyggeston and Queen Elizabeth I College, and was a British sprint canoer who competed in the mid-1970s. He was eliminated in the repechages of the K-2 1000 m event at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montréal.

response: *Norman Mason (American musician) (before 1900–after 1969), American jazz multi-instrumentalist and bandleader
*Norman Mason (canoeist) (born 1952), British competitor at 1976 Summer Olympics
